titleStmt.title: [Abstract] 1822 Oct. 7 Abstract of the minutes of the Abingdon Presbytery / Hebron Church : a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Hebron Church

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Special Collections Library, University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Special Collections Librarian, Hoskins Library, University of Tennessee, 1401 Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996. (865) 974-4480.

bibl.title: [Abstract] 1822 Oct. 7 Abstract of the minutes of the Abingdon Presbytery / Hebron Church
bibl.author: Hebron Church
bibl.note: This document is an abstract of the minutes of the Abingdon Presbytery taken on October 7, 1822. The abstract states that Reverend Andrew S. Morrison will leave the Presbytery of Union and is well accepted at the Presbytery of Abingdon.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p:
The
Revd Reverend Andrew S. Morrison produced an extract from the minutes of the Presbytery of Union under the hand of the Clerk certifying his regular dismission from that Presbytery & directing Mr. Morrison to attach himself to the Presbytery of Abingdon where upon he was received as a member in good standing and invited to take his seat
I hereby certify that the above is a true extract from the minutes of Abingdon Presbytery page 257.

closer.signed:
Saml Samuel W. Doak Stated Clk Clerk
A. P. Abingdon Presbytery
